keyword: how many calories in in n out cheeseburger
title: How Many Calories in an In-N-Out Cheeseburger?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in in n out cheeseburger, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this classic fast-food item.
h1: How Many Calories in an In-N-Out Cheeseburger?
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out cheeseburger: grilled beef patty, American cheese, sesame bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, and Thousand Island-style spread; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out cheeseburger has about 480 kcal, with 25 g protein and 27 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions, pickles)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories in in n out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for a standard In-N-Out cheeseburger.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 25 g of protein per cheeseburger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Around 980 mg of sodium, mostly from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out cheeseburgers high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 27 g total fat including 11 g saturated fat per burger.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Options like animal style add ~190 kcal; protein style (no bun) cuts ~240 kcal.
